title: Crater Lake National Park: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       The park has two motels. Both are operated by Xanterra Parks & Resorts. Reservations can be made online or by calling 888-774-2728. For a list of accommodations outside the park, download the Lodging & Camping brochure from our publications page.  Â       Crater Lake Lodge Crater Lake Lodge (71 rooms) overlooks the lake at Rim Village. In 2016, it will be open May 20 through October 22. Rooms begin at $180 per night. Advance reservations are highly recommended. The Cabins at Mazama Village The Mazama Cabins (40 rooms) are located 7 miles south of Rim Village. Rooms are $152 per night. Operating dates for 2016 are May 27 through October 9.
